title: Watch all Bukayo brilliance against Bournemouth
body_text:
Bukayo Saka put in another fine display during our incredible 3-2 win against Bournemouth on Saturday, and you can see everything he got up to in In Focus - presented by Acronis.
Our cameras followed the attacker throughout the game against the Cherries, tracking his every touch as he put the visiting defence on high alert time after time to play his part in our incredible comeback victory.
You can take a closer look at his performance by pressing play on the video above.
